title: Windows 8.1 X64 9in1 OEM en-US Aug 2016 {Generation2}
description:
* Windows 8.1 X64 9in1 OEM en-US Aug 2016 {Generation2} 


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: W81X64.9in1.OEM.en-US.Aug2016.iso
* Size: 5,71GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: 6d8cb172
* MD5 : 19daf41c013026af4c1c189f3078e344
* SHA-1: fe7ace3a4ceeb5bf37fa249013ea8d0e86df9c5a

* SOURCES: dvd-6051480 & 6054382 

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed:

* .NET Framework 3.5 enabled
* .NET Framework 4.6.2 (KB3181564)
* Updates -> 2016-08-09
* Defender Updates


[ FEATURES ]

* UEFI-ready 
* (Use attached Rufus USB-tool to make UEFI-bootable).
* Splitted install.wim to support UEFI boot ( FAT32 )
* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 10.0 (Microsoft DaRT)

[ LANGUAGE ]

* en-US = ENGLISH US

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Home - - - - STD / KMS / OEM
* Windows 8.1 Pro- - - - - STD / KMS / OEM
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise - STD / KMS / OEM

* STD = Standard installation
* KMS = Activated by KMS
* OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) will automatically 
* activate original version installed by Manufacturer.

* Exclusions for KMS are pre-set in Defender.

[ SCREENSHOTS ]

[url]http://extraimago.com/image/wOR2[/url]

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

[ CREDITS ]
* ashish.k & stevie-boy for continued
* support & help with user questions.

* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 @ ET, KAT & TPB
